name: Play of Light
description:
You are a timeless wanderer. A lone figure unencumbered by gravity, you set out to explore the stars and uncover the constellations.

A grappling hook made of light allows you to launch and swing from any surface. If there's a solid structure - no matter how far - the light-grapple will reach it.

Explore at your own pace. Let the atmospheric music cascade around you. Uncover the hidden spires and illuminate the stars to reveal over 50 constellations.

Find your own path when you play with light.

Recommended System Specifications

  • Windows XP SP3 / VISTA / 7 / 8
  • 2 GHz CPU or better
  • 2 GB RAM or better
  • Graphics card with Shader Model 3.0 support

(If you're at all wondering if Play of Light will run on your machine, download the free demo and find out for certain!)

Original soundtrack

  • 15 song OST comes bundled with the full game!
